props.name: aria-label
props.description: Provide an optional label to override the default name for the Banner landmark region

props.name: description
props.description: Provide an optional description for the Banner. This should provide supplemental information about the Banner

props.name: hideTitle
props.description: Whether to hide the title visually.

props.name: icon
props.description: Provide a custom icon for the Banner. This is only available when `variant` is `info` or `upsell`

props.name: onDismiss
props.description: Optionally provide a handler to be called when the banner is dismissed. Providing this prop will show a dismiss button

props.name: title
props.description: The title for the Banner. This will be used as the accessible name and is required unless `Banner.Title` is used as a child
